name: Say Cheese
description: A most unusual cheese. Anyone eating Say Cheese will first break out into a smile, followed by fits of giggles. A hit at parties

name: Salam Salami
description: Eating Salaam Salami brings a rush of good feelings for all people of the world. One cannot eat this salami and stay angry at anyone. Ideal for family reunions.

name: Bran-chovies
description: This high-fiber fish was raised in the bran beds of the Sargasso Sea. Eating this pizza each day reduces cholesterol, lowers blood pressure, and even improves skin complexion.

name: Croon-a-Tune Mushroom
description: This mushroom causes the eater to immediately break out in song, and possibly dance. Popular in Karaoke parlors.

name: Fuzzy Olive
description: Fuzzy Olives are prized for their hair-growing properties. These tasty toppings will cause curly locks to sprout on even the most stubbornly bald pate.

name: Meaty Meatball
description: An all-natural topping that helps aspiring athletes really pack on the muscle. A pizza a day and you'll be winning body-building competitions in no time! (kiddo lvl)

name: Yawn Prawn
description: This variety is harvested throughout Asia for medicinal purposes. It induces a healthful night's sleep.

name: Prickly Pineapple
description: A tart and snappy fruit that makes the eater a bit difficult to get along with - but also tough to win an argument against. A favorite for lawyers.

name: Shakin' Bacon
description: Two left feet? Unable to shimmy? This is the bacon for you. Anyone can dance after a meal of Shakin' Bacon pizza.

name: Wing a Ding
description: Made from especially musical poultry. This topping gives the eater perfect pitch.

name: Dough-Nut Donut
description: Dough Nuts. That pretty much says it all. It's unbaked, but some people like that.

name: Banana Split
description: Bananas, whipped cream, chocolate sauce, a cherry. We recommend leaving the tomato sauce off this one. A tasty dessert pizza.

name: Uncrabby Crab
description: This special variety of crab is the perfect pick-me-up on a day when you just feel mean and grumpy.

name: Peanut Butter
description: "Your pizza is in my peanut butter!" Etc. Dollops of Grade A peanut butter top this one.

name: Imported Iceberg Ice Cube
description: Pure blue glacier ice, chipped from small icebergs towed annually to the Strombolis' Venetian workshops.

name: Smart Egg
description: An eggstra special diet fed to the hens results in these brain-boosting ovoids. High in CoQDoodleDo enzymes.

name: Rocket Fuel Sausage
description: SPICY. Pour yourself a big glass of water in advance.

name: Cavalier Caviar
description: A strongly flavored black caviar. For the dashing, devil-may-cry diner.

name: Stromboli Special Gold Chocolate
description: This chocolate is shaved off an enormous bar of Italy's best chocolate, kept in a clomate-controlled vault in Rome since 1923.

name: Baba Ganoush
description: A smoky eggplant dip with lemon, garlic, and olive oil and drizzled liberally on top of this pizza.

name: Blue Lobster
description: A blue lobster is a rare, 1-in-a-million creature, which should be displayed to the public and researched by marine scientists - but instead will end up on your pizza.

name: Mexican Jumping Bean
description: You'll be bouncing off the walls! Great for parties and for kids on their way to gymnatics class.

name: Italian Fries
description: The real thing. The Strombolis fried the first potatoes centuries before any Frenchmen got the idea.

name: St. Patrick Cheese
description: This cheese has a mild flavor, with a grassy note added by the all-clover diet of the dairy herds.

name: Veggie Taco
description: Where's the beef? Not here! A healthy alternative.

name: Dunkin' Pumpkin
description: Nutritious specialty pumpkin helps you hold your breath longer underwater. A favorite with free divers.
